html:
6.23.18  9:12 pm   Dude wth happened to the bill wurtz band

     when

6.23.18  8:44 pm   why do people assume that you mean anything else in your songs than what you just mean

     perhaps they didn't know what i meant

6.23.18  8:40 pm   Why is a dog?

     to see what it's like

6.23.18  8:38 pm   did you intend for the hellos at the beginning of your new song to follow the fibonacci sequence {hello hello.., hello hello hello.., hello hello hello hello hello.. (2, 3, 5)}?

     no but it makes sense that it would be that way

6.23.18  8:36 pm   I always have trouble singing if I'm playing an instrument at the same time with a different rhythm. Do you have any tips on how to get better at this?

     if there's a particular one that is giving you trouble, just practice it with a click, slow, and then gradually speed up the click

6.23.18  8:28 pm   follow up: I think putting together an album even just a compilation with a couple new tracks could get ur music more seriously looked at by critics.

     i am a critic, and every time i think long and hard about this i just come to the conclusion that albums aren't necessary anymore, especially not for me. they can fight me, critic v. critic

      would this be against your whole vibe or would u welcome professional criticism of ur music? (i think it could stand up to it well)

6.23.18  8:18 pm   sometimes your anagrams are too good to be true and i want to check if you didnt cheat. you never do but can i trust you?

     always check. it's very easy to check, you can actually just do it right on the site if you paste any of the answers into the request box, it should automatically come up in green, with the other answers under it

6.23.18  8:15 pm   How can we assist you on your journey to the top forty?

     it is not your responsibility. it is my responsibility to make the music unstoppable

6.23.18  8:06 pm   do you mind people telling you what to do?

     it depends what they tell me to do

6.23.18  8:02 pm   which vegetable is the most romantic

     mixed

6.23.18  7:51 pm   how do you feel about the fact that i cut off the bottom of the 'key to being creative' shirt? did i just use my ability to be creative, or did i take your creative and add my creative to it?

     you did that all on your own

6.23.18  7:45 pm   do you like Planes?

     yes, and trains

6.23.18  7:35 pm   what did the squirrels say?

     that would vary from squirrel to squirrel

6.23.18  7:28 pm   your latest questions have been a litte off.

     i disagree

      is this still bill?

     yes

6.23.18  7:27 pm   is the punctuation for the last line in sexy pants: "hello," simon says, "let me sign your checks."

     yes

6.23.18  6:54 pm   6.22.18  9:34 am   is that the longest question you've ever got or answered?

     i don't think so

6.23.18  6:09 pm   Do your songs ever have actual meaning, even maybe just to you; or are they just random

     songwriting is one of the most meaningful things i know of. that's why i do it, and i'm also very particular about every choice i make in the song. i'm not sure if that answers your question

6.23.18  5:51 pm   6.22.18  5:49 pm well, i'm actually having a problem playing really quickly on guitar. i can play 3rds in a C maj scale (1,3,2,4,(or c,e,d,f) and so on) as 16th notes at 113bpm. but i'm having like a physical problem with my hand.

     does it hurt

      i don't know if that's not supposed to happen and I'm holding my guitar weirdly or that's normal and i just need to suck it up and plow through it.

     not if it hurts

      being alone i'm forced with the latter, but i guess it's not too bad being trapped at 113bpm. 

     an interesting secret is if you are playing the notes you actually want to play, you can get unexpected bursts of energy and have a little bit of extra powers, which you don't have when doing scalular exercises

6.23.18  5:50 pm   should all actions be guided only by one's own self-interests (rational or ethical)?

     maybe just some? just to mix it up

6.23.18  5:50 pm   Why do your videos look like you were you on acid while making them?

     perhaps you associate colorfulness with acid. i love colors

6.23.18  5:46 pm   how do I find meaning in life?

     you could cook up a brand new batch

6.23.18  5:42 pm   Are the pants inherently sexy, or does it depend on the person? 

     it depends particularly upon the person's morals, and principles

6.23.18  5:38 pm   how many things do you have in mind but haven't made yet?

     zillions

      will you ever catch up?

     no

6.23.18  5:11 pm   when you write lyrics do you ever think about how it may be interpreted

     yes

6.23.18  4:53 pm   when are you getting back home

     about 8 hours from when you asked this

6.23.18  4:25 pm   what's a good way to start a band with your friends?

     that is not my area of expertise

6.23.18  3:50 pm   what happens when 2 universes collide?

     a universe is made

6.23.18  3:29 pm   what's updog?

     i will never tell

6.23.18  3:23 pm   The "Simon says" line in your new song is so dreamy. How did you come up with it?

     i don't know

6.23.18  3:12 pm   hi bill. how many pants do you have

     2 or more

6.23.18  2:38 pm   If "enternity will still devour whatever music of the hour continues to reverberate", why do we do things? Especially, why you do? You/we will be forgotten through ages. No, through couple years! So, everything is stupid/pointless. What is your view?

     disagree wildly with every point you made

6.23.18  1:58 pm   if i put pants on do they automatically become sexy?

     yes

6.23.18  1:06 pm   Now that you have the green screen, does that mean your room won't be appearing in your live action music vids anymore?

     it might. or perhaps even a different room

6.23.18  12:57 pm   What makes a good mix?

     if they can hear the song clearly enough to like it

6.23.18  12:29 pm   i dont want to die but i dont want to live at the same time
any ideas for a good alternative? ?

     there are more ways to live that you haven't discovered yet. there are even ways that no one has discovered yet. bonus points for discovering one of those ways

6.23.18  10:49 am   What was your inspiration for sexy pants?

     i don't remember

6.23.18  9:52 am   this may be a bit odd, but did you release sexy pants on the international yoga day on purpose?

     no

6.23.18  9:00 am   Please use one emoticon in answer of that question. Please. Just one time.

     too late i've already used it way more times

6.23.18  8:59 am   how was the panel

     it was groovy

6.23.18  8:32 am   what music instrument do you feel like is u want to maybe learn how to play next

     motorized camera dollies, and/or programmable flying camera drones

6.23.18  7:46 am   Give me a tool to put in my songwriting tool kit please.

     timed run throughs, with a metronome, and walk over and touch the door handle before each one. and shut the metronome off just before you get to the split point (the end of what you are sure of so far) and sit silently and try to catch the lightning bolt. it will be at its clearest within 1 second of reaching the split point. then brainstorm all the traces of things you might have learned. play 'what do we know'. then do another run through. putting ear plugs in and jogging in place while doing the run thru in your head can also be a good way to find the answers

6.23.18  7:32 am   Bill, you have built an empire of... weird, awesomeness, you have super loyal fans but as far as I know never do many social events. Why not?

     i prefer Business events

6.23.18  7:18 am   Is a soul something than can be constructed or given by the time you are born?

     and place, but more importantly how

6.23.18  7:16 am   Do you ever think?

     yes

6.23.18  7:13 am   What do you think about thinking

     seems legit

6.23.18  7:03 am   Why do you edit your videos with thos style of editing?

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

6.23.18  6:00 am   my pants stopped being sexy, what do?

     did you try turning them off and then on again

6.23.18  5:24 am   How do I convince my friend that his relationship with his girlfriend is toxic?

     go on a game show with her, to try to find out "Who's Toxic!?!?"

6.23.18  5:18 am   When you use "baby" in your lyrics do you mean an infant. 

     no

6.23.18  4:01 am   Hi Bill,

I have this really bad habit of starting really cool projects (at least, it seemed exciting stuff at the time), but then never finishing really any of them because they are displaced by new, current, in the moment things to think about and plan and try to do. It's like I forget how awesome the ideas felt to me when I came up with them. I've tried your strategy of just cateloging and recording every damn thing I think of, but I never end up going back to listen to them, and meanwhile I'm neck deepin something else that caught my attention, whether it's figuring out how the fuck math works, how the fuck computers work, how the fuck communication (e.g. talking politely, teaching) works, and also how the fuck the world works.

     you are going through the exact same thing i went through for many years

      realize of bad habits to have, this is definitely not the worst I could have. But it's just so fucking annoying when you are going to bed at 2 in the morning to wake up for school at 6:30 and you feel like you 've done nothing of substance, big and meaningful. Like I could be doing so much more, making the world just a little more cooler (I'd like to think), but just controlling the urge to swim deeper into the ocean even though you just dragged yourself out of the deep end is hard somehow. I can't shift from thinking "But what? But why?" to "time to make shit."

And really? I'm realizing that I'm okay with myself still humming a long, looking at and thinking about interesting stuff, because at the end of the day it is fun. But how exactly can I keep this up forever?  This is fun, but I've kind of had the same kind of fun for a while now. Can I please just switch?

     you will switch gradually, as your desire to switch continues to grow to firey new heights

      I'm honestly kind of just insecure, because now I'm just thinking, do I even know what I'm saying right now? Is it really that big of a deal? Even when my thoughts are trying to say otherwise. There is a disconnect here between feelings and thought, and I'm not sure what is going on. And no, those were not th e good w ords to use there...that's not quite what I meant to say... I'm not sure if it's just sleep dep. making everything wobbly and unfocused, or my brain purposely trying not to think about this.

I hate the feeling when I see both people that I follow online and people around me actually doing things,

     this is first hand proof that you are hard wired for success, beyond a shadow of a doubt. your ambitions are through the roof, and your standards are on the ceiling. and you think about it morning day and night, and in between

      nd when other people around me are like "dude just be lazy and stop caring so much" IF I CARE SO MUCH WHY AM I GOING TO BED AT 3 JUST TO FINISH A GOD DAMN SCHOOL ASSIGNMENT well, let me take that back. I didn't start until 1, but I could have finished much earlier if I would have just half-assed it which would still have gotten me an A. And I was running away from starting it because I had no idea how to do it.

     classic

      I'm trying to learn Debussy's L'isle Joyeuse over the summer, attempting to make a karaoke track to "and the day goes on" with a DS soundfont I have, digitizing a Bible of sorts (not religious) with cool layout, pictures, and design, making a movie with my frie nd starring King Lear, and creating computer programs to help with scheduling. (There's a circle here somewhere...) Oh, and writing college essays. The sad thing is, there is more than enough time to do all this stuff, and more time to do more, during the summer. I know this. Everything would be great if I actually worked on it, instead I'm not. And I know the answer to this is that I'm on the right track, or that there is a tipping point. It's just so frustrating, and scary, because I don't know if I want to see myself if I ever go past that tipping point.

I don't want to be boxed into everything. But I'm kind of wondering if I do need some sort of box to be able to continuously work on stuff.

     i think you will find that the box is just going to be your name. you. i know it's tempting to live a thousand parallel creator's lives, but there's barely enough time to live 1. so i think an umbrella strategy might ultimately work best for you here. as soon as you get fully comfortable with the fact that you are mr. do-it-all, you can start treating yourself like a king and just plan the task sequence from there.

      I can't think of really a whole project to finish in a day, like your schedule when you were starting.

     that is why it is so vitally important to start very very short, small, and simple. there is a whole host of things that are learned AFTER you get your feet on the ground and doing things, that you never could have learned before. to sum it up into 2 points, first you will learn how far away actual real creations are from the vivid splendor you have imagined. but close on the heels of that is point 2 which is realizing how insanely much CAN be done, even just using the simplest tools available to you. learning happens fast from project to project, and the good news is, all your interests will find their way onto the menu. as long as you keep the train moving, you will surely hit all the stops and more. did i mention start small, trains are heavy

      Sorry, this kinda like turned into many different issues. I can't even lay a finger on a specific problem I'm having. Hate to bother you with this, but it's jus t a big frustration for me that I haven't changed. Well, that's not true, I have changed a little, I'm looking at *literal* trash less often...

Even if you don't reply, thanks for being an outlet for my thoughts. Sorry for this huge mess of a ramble, I'm also very tired, as I'm sure you are too.

-IronLotus
